name: Ultimate Field Collections (UFC) â€“ Field & Content Manager
author: Ultimate Field Collections

sections.description:
Ultimate Field Collections (UFC) provides a centralized dashboard that lets you manage all your website content in a simple and user-friendly interface. Once the custom fields are created, you can easily update the field settings, assign them to different pages and update the content within the same collection.

This is an Extension of Advanced Custom Field (ACF)

How Can UFC Help Me?

  • Edit field settings and field values without opening dozens of browser tabs
  • Organize posts/pages in collections that share the same custom fields
  • Focus on updating the website content without any distractions

Available Field Types

Layout

  • Group
  • Tab
  • Accordion
  • Message Block
  • Repeater (Coming soon in Pro)
  • Flexible Content (Coming soon in Pro)

Text

  • Plain Text
  • Visual Editor
  • Text Area
  • Email
  • Number
  • Range
  • URL
  • Password

Media

  • Image
  • Gallery (Coming soon in Pro)
  • File
  • oEmbed
  • Color
  • Map

Choices

  • Dropdown
  • Checkbox
  • Radio
  • Button Group
  • Date/Time
  • Switch

Relational

  • Taxonomy
  • Post Object
  • Relationship
  • Link
  • Page Link
  • User
  • Clone (Coming soon in Pro)
sections.changelog:
1.2.0 – 2022-12-20

  • Added search and filters in the Content tab.
  • Added ability to add posts/pages in the Content tab.
  • Added ACF field type (Button Group).
  • Added support to open a post with a link.
  • Fixed post object error.
  • Fixed ACF export code.
  • Fixed Tabs/Accordion issues.
  • Improved overall UI and features.
  • Tweaked URL parameters to match the tab names.

1.1.0 – 2022-11-23

  • Added additional ACF field types (Text Area, oEmbed, Message, Password, URL, User, Page Link, and Range).
  • Added support to open a collection with a link.
  • Added search and filters in the collection list.
  • Added Enable/Disable toggle in each collection.
  • Added shortcuts to quickly open the Field or Content tab from the collection list.
  • Added support to edit post slug in the post content.
  • Improved overall UI.
  • Fixed timepicker js error.
  • Fixed unsaved notifications not being triggered for some field types.

1.0.1 – 2022-09-21

  • Added plugin icons.
  • Fixed missing files for ckeditor.

1.0.0 – 2022-09-10

  • Initial release.

short_description: Streamline the entire content management process for your WordPress site.
